type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️ ## Custom Death Sound --- [Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/custom_death_sound) Modifies the sound being played if the entity that has the power dies. Type ID: `apugli:custom_death_sound` --- ### Examples ```json { "type": "apugli:custom_death_sound", "muted": true } ``` This example will mute the death sound of the entity that has the power.
```json { "type": "apugli:custom_death_sound", "sound": "minecraft:entity.axolotl.death" } ``` This example will replace the death sound of the entity that has the power with the `minecraft:entity.axolotl.death` sound event.
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️ ## Custom Death Sound --- [Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/custom_death_sound) Modifies the sound being played if the entity that has the power dies. Type ID: `apugli:custom_death_sound` --- ### Examples ```json { "type": "apugli:custom_death_sound", "muted": true } ``` This example will mute the death sound of the entity that has the power.
```json { "type": "apugli:custom_death_sound", "sound": "minecraft:entity.axolotl.death" } ``` This example will replace the death sound of the entity that has the power with the `minecraft:entity.axolotl.death` sound event.

muted.description: Determines whether the death sound should be muted.
muted.markdownDescription: Determines whether the death sound should be muted.

sound.description: If specified, this sound event will play instead of the original death sound of the entity that has the power.
sound.markdownDescription: If specified, this sound event will play instead of the original death sound of the entity that has the power.

sounds.description: If specified, these sound events will play instead of the original death sound of the entity that has the power in a random fashion.
sounds.markdownDescription: If specified, these sound events will play instead of the original death sound of the entity that has the power in a random fashion.

volume.description: Determines the volume of the sound event(s) being played.
volume.markdownDescription: Determines the volume of the sound event(s) being played.

pitch.description: Determines the pitch of the sound event(s) being played.
pitch.markdownDescription: Determines the pitch of the sound event(s) being played.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Custom Death Sound (Power Types) date: 2022-02-19

Custom Death Sound

Power Type

Modifies the sound being played if the entity that has the power dies.

Type ID: apugli:custom_death_sound

Fields

Field Type Default Description
muted Boolean false Determines whether the death sound should be muted.
sound Weighted Sound Event optional If specified, this sound event will play instead of the original death sound of the entity that has the power.
sounds Array of Weighted Sound Events optional If specified, these sound events will play instead of the original death sound of the entity that has the power in a random fashion.
volume Float 1.0 Determines the volume of the sound event(s) being played.
pitch Float 1.0 Determines the pitch of the sound event(s) being played.

Examples

{
    "type": "apugli:custom_death_sound",
    "muted": true
}

This example will mute the death sound of the entity that has the power. 

{
    "type": "apugli:custom_death_sound",
    "sound": "minecraft:entity.axolotl.death"
}

This example will replace the death sound of the entity that has the power with the minecraft:entity.axolotl.death sound event.
